Package chess_game

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess_game.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class to represent all the different potential types of chess pieces. There is no need for setter methods for movementPattern or color, since these cannot be changed after the game begins. For pawns that promote, a new Piece of the proper rank will be created and the old pawn will be deleted.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece​(java.util.ArrayList<Pair> move,
             boolean color,
             Pair location)
        Constructs a Piece object.
        Parameters:
        move - The valid movement patterns the piece can have.
        color - A boolean representing the team the piece is allied with. False is Black, True is White.
        location - The Piece's current location on the board.
